title: ORAM
subtitle:
One group of enterprising LGBTIQ refugees is taking matters into their own hands and has spearheaded a new soap making business.

Join ORAM today in supporting this new enterprise! Donate: https://oramrefugee.org/donate/ 

You can give LGBTIQ refugees a FRESH start!  
#refugees #LGBTIQpic.twitter.com/WgrxlZ5S4f

title: Israel i Norge
subtitle:
The Ambassador & @HagarSpiroTal recently met Lyn Julius, the author of #Uprooted, the true story of the 850K Jews displaced from their homes in the #MiddleEast and #NorthAfrica. They were never recognized as #refugees, nor received any compensation.

title: #HowWillTheyHear
